name: Additive serotonergic burden
actions: Avoid unnecessary combinations of serotonergic agents.
Monitor for early signs of serotonin toxicity (educational).

rationale: Combined serotonergic effects increase toxicity risk.

explanation_template: {A_name} and {B_name} both increase serotonergic activity. Combined use increases serotonergic toxicity risk, particularly with higher doses or additional serotonergic agents.
